description: Modern and sculpted. Protective and secure. The Santiago DV 35 pouch safeguards a compact, high-definition camcorder with a hard, ribbed shell with dense EVA foam padding. This construction ensures maximum protection from bumps and abrasion. Includes: dual zipper pulls, a low-profile belt loop, and detachable shoulder strap.
title: Lowepro LP36372 Santiago DV 35 Camera Pouch (Black)
